DamageResistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, Slashing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Aura of Despair
Traits.Content: Creatures that start their turn within 20 feet of the Ore Vein must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 12) or suffer disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of their next turn.

Traits.Name: Weakened Offense
Traits.Content: The Ore Vein's Crystal Lash attack deals only 1d6 piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Crystal Lash
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, dealing 3 (1d6) piercing damage. The jagged crystals lash out, sapping the strength of those struck.

Actions.Name: Shatter Pulse
Actions.Content: Targeted Effect: The vein emits a crack of crystal energy. All creatures within 15 ft. must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 13) or take 9 (2d8) thunder damage and be deafened until the end of their next turn.
